name: GLTsymtest
author: AFNI Developers
description: A tool to test the validity of '-gltsym' strings for use with 3dDeconvolve or 3dREMLfit.

inputs.description: A flag to only output BAD messages rather than all messages
inputs.name: Badonly Flag

inputs.description: A list of allowed variable names in the expression, separated by commas, semicolons, and/or spaces
inputs.name: Variable List

inputs.description: GLT symbolic expression(s), enclosed in quotes
inputs.name: Expression
